body_html: @lemillos thank you for answering me. Please, could you be more precise ? What I have to do step by step ? Install Conda package and then simply type on my cmd conda install tensorflow keras? What are you meaning for "create a new environment"? Do you mean a virtual environment? You would help me a lot, thank you anyway
